statements: UPDATE student_enrollment SET grade = 'A' WHERE student_id = 12345;
UPDATE student_enrollment SET attendance_status = true, course_name = 'History' WHERE course_id = 56789;
UPDATE student_enrollment SET grade = 'A', attendance_status = true WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101
UPDATE student_enrollment SET course_name = 'Advanced Mathematics', grade = 'B', attendance_status = false WHERE course_id = 201 AND student_id = 2
UPDATE course_enrollment SET grade = 'A', attendance = true WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
UPDATE student SET email = 'test_email@example.com', first_name = 'John' WHERE student_id = 5;
UPDATE course_enrollment SET grade = 'A', attendance = TRUE WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
UPDATE student SET first_name = 'John', email = 'john@example.com' WHERE student_id = 2;
UPDATE courses SET course_credit = 4 WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE grades SET grade = 85 WHERE student_id = 201 AND course_id = 101;
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Mathematics', course_credit = 3 WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE grades SET grade = 85 WHERE student_id = 10 AND course_id = 2;
UPDATE Course SET instructor = 'Professor Smith' WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE Student SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE student_id = 123;
UPDATE CourseEnrollment SET grade='A', attendance=true WHERE student_id=1 AND course_id=101;

UPDATE courses SET course_description = 'New course description' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE students SET gender = 'Female' WHERE student_id = 3;
UPDATE courses SET course_name = 'Data Science', course_description = 'Advanced data analysis techniques' WHERE course_id = 1;
UPDATE students SET date_of_birth = '1994-05-20', gender = 'Male', student_name = 'John Doe' WHERE student_id = 3;
